description: Goods imported from China will now face a combined total tariff rate of 54%, Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said Wednesday.
title: Goods imported from China now face a 54% tariff rate

description: Lawyers for Erik and Lyle Menendez urged a judge to block an effort from L.A. County DA Nathan Hochman to withdraw his office’s support for reducing the brothers’ sentences of life without the possibility of parole for the 1989 killings of their parents.
title: Lawyers for Menendez brothers say prosecutor’s reasons for opposing reduced sentences are ‘patently meritless’

description: In today’s edition, we dive into President Donald Trump’s sweeping new tariffs and the fallout from Tuesday’s elections in Wisconsin and Florida.
title: Trump ramps up his trade war: From the Politics Desk

description: Some state officials are warning about overcrowding and long wait times at Department of Motor Vehicles offices across the country as the deadline approaches for airline passengers to show a Real ID to board domestic flights.
title: As the Real ID deadline looms, DMV offices expect even longer lines than usual

description: A team that tracked how well in vitro fertilization worked across the U.S. was abruptly cut Tuesday as part of the sweeping layoffs at the Department of Health and Human Services.
title: CDC's IVF team gutted even as Trump calls himself the 'fertilization president'

description: Republicans say they’re not panicking as they gear up for major races later this year and a fierce battle for control of Congress next year, despite getting shellacked in the Wisconsin Supreme Court race — and seeing their margins decrease notably in a pair of special House election wins in deep-red Florida districts.
title: Republicans aren't panicking about Trump or Elon Musk after Tuesday’s elections

description: A congressman wants to pass legislation that would increase transparency around caffeine content, three years after the death of a student with a heart condition.
title: Legislator pushes for caffeine label law after 2022 death blamed on Charged Lemonade

description: Global markets reacted sharply and swiftly after President Donald Trump revealed his much-anticipated tariff plans Wednesday, with investors fleeing U.S. stock indexes and companies that rely on global supply chains seeing their stocks plummet.
title: Investors flee U.S. stocks as markets react sharply to Trump's tariff plan

description: With 25 hours and 5 minutes, Booker broke the Senate speech record held by Sen. Strom Thurmond who argued for a full day against the Civil Rights Act of 1957, which established voting rights protections for Black people.
title: Booker's Senate record broke Thurmond's plea to 'go down fighting' against voting rights

description: Fifty years ago, life expectancy in the U.S. and wealthy European countries was relatively similar.
title: Not even wealth is saving Americans from dying at rates seen among some of the poorest Europeans

description: A group of Senate Republicans on is set to deliver a symbolic rebuke to President Donald Trump's tariffs on Canadian products.
title: Some Senate Republicans plan to rebuke Trump's tariffs on his 'Liberation Day'

description: Students at the University of Colorado and Colorado State University have lost their visas, following a wave of high-profile arrests of international students across the country.
title: Trump administration revokes visas of 10 Colorado international students, universities say

description: Former reality star Teddi Mellencamp revealed that her skin cancer has reached Stage 4 after doctors found tumors on her lungs and brain that required surgical intervention earlier this year.
title: Teddi Mellencamp says her cancer is now Stage 4 after metastasizing to lungs and brain

description: President Trump announced reciprocal tariffs on foreign nations, calling it a “Declaration of Economic Independence.” In a speech marking what he dubbed “Liberation Day,” he argued that for decades, foreign nations have exploited American workers and industries, and promised the new policy will bring jobs and factories back to the U.S.
title: Trump announces reciprocal tariffs on 'Liberation Day'

description: Authorities rely on informants for operations against criminal networks, but some who've collaborated face immigration problems and face a 'huge risk,' an attorney says.
title: A DEA immigrant informant fears he could be deported: 'Matter of life and death'

description: The American Civil Liberties Union filed a lawsuit Wednesday alleging that the National Institutes of Health has conducted an “ongoing ideological purge of critical research projects” that violates federal law and is unconstitutional.
title: ACLU sues National Institutes of Health for 'ideological purge' of research projects

description: WASHINGTON — Boeing CEO Kelly Ortberg told senators on Wednesday that he’s happy with the company’s progress improving manufacturing and safety practices following several accidents, including a near catastrophe last year.
title: Boeing says it's progressing on safety reforms and working with DOJ on revised plea deal

description: One month after Democratic Rep. Sylvester Turner's death, Texas GOP Gov. Greg Abbott has yet to call a special election to fill his seat.
title: Hakeem Jeffries threatens lawsuit over delayed Texas special election

description: Senate Republicans released a new budget blueprint Wednesday that would pave the way for $1.5 trillion in new tax cuts in addition to making President Donald Trump’s 2017 tax cuts permanent.
title: Senate Republicans release budget blueprint with new tax cuts and a $5 trillion debt limit hike

description: United Airlines plans to add daily flights to Vietnam and Thailand in October, further expanding the network for the U.S. carrier that already has the most Asia service.
title: United Airlines adds Thailand, Vietnam and Australia flights in latest expansion

description: Aubrey Bertram was starting to imagine her life without student debt.
title: 35-year-old was 29 months away from getting her $247,804 student debt forgiven. Now she's stuck.

description: It’s been 20 years since “Grey’s Anatomy” first premiered, and Ellen Pompeo still thinks the show has staying power.
title: Ellen Pompeo talks about the future of 'Grey’s Anatomy' — and if she’ll be in it

description: Themes of longing, loneliness and the power of love — romantic, familial and self-love — are constant throughout Maria Shriver’s poetry collection.
title: Maria Shriver says it was 'scary' to release her poetry book. Here's why she did it.

description: President Trump has told his Cabinet that Elon Musk would be leaving his government role in the coming months, according to a senior White House official.
title: Trump told Cabinet members Elon Musk would be leaving government role soon

description: Getting vaccinated against shingles may not only lower risk for the condition — it may offer some protection against dementia, a new study suggests.
title: This vaccine may protect against dementia, as well as a painful herpes zoster flare-up

description: At 2 days old, Finnley Kelce just became the youngest podcasting star within her famous family.
title: Kylie Kelce introduces new baby on podcast only 2 days after giving birth

description: Macaulay Culkin is giving a candid update about his relationship — or lack thereof — with his father, Kit Culkin, who he has previously called a “bad man.”
title: Macaulay Culkin shares an update on his relationship with his estranged father

description: DENVER — Michael Malone called him Superman.
title: Nikola Jokic scores career-high 61 points, plays nearly 53 minutes in double-OT loss to Wolves

description: Glen Powell spoke about reuniting with his “Anyone But You” co-star Sydney Sweeney recently at his sister’s wedding in a "TODAY" exclusive on Wednesday.
title: Glen Powell addresses Sydney Sweeney being at sister’s ‘fun, rowdy’ wedding

description: The Wisconsin Supreme Court election underscored that Democrats hold a key advantage in lower-profile contests in the Trump era.
title: Steve Kornacki: How Democratic voter intensity powered Susan Crawford to a win in Wisconsin

description: Kelly Clarkson’s 10-year-old daughter, River Rose, looked so grown up when she acted as a “mini-producer” on her mom’s eponymous talk show.
title: Kelly Clarkson's daughter is all grown up as she steps in as 'mini-producer' for mom’s talk show

description: California lawmakers won’t change state policies allowing transgender kids and teens to play on sports teams consistent with their gender identities.
title: California lawmakers reject bills to ban trans athletes' participation in girls sports

description: A 5-year-old Florida boy died after drinking apple juice that authorities said contained methamphetamine in it, and his mother has been charged in connection with his death.
title: 5-year-old dies after drinking bottle of apple juice allegedly containing meth, mother charged

description: Amazon has made a late bid to purchase TikTok, a person familiar with the ongoing White House-led discussions told NBC News.
title: Amazon joins list of TikTok suitors as deadline for U.S. buyer nears

description: The 28-year-old who fatally shot six people at a private Tennessee Christian school was primarily motivated by "notoriety" in the planned 2023 attack, police concluded in a final investigation report released on Wednesday.
title: Nashville school shooter sought fame in 2023 attack that left 6 dead, report finds

description: Dustin May took the mound for the Los Angeles Dodgers a changed man. Making his first major league start since May 17, 2023, he allowed just one hit and an unearned run over five innings in the Dodgers’ 3-1 victory over the Atlanta Braves on Tuesday night.
title: After cheating death, Dodgers pitcher Dustin May makes his way back to the mound

description: Consumers are hitting the gas on car purchases to head off expected price hikes from Trump’s new tariffs, which threaten to reverse recent momentum in auto sales.
title: Tariff-wary buyers scoop up vehicles before the 'storm' hits car prices

description: President Donald Trump will announce tariffs today on potentially trillions of dollars' worth of imports, an action he has called "Liberation Day."
title: Trump's tariff threats helped erase stock gains

description: NHTSA regulations still allow car companies in the U.S. to test for safety using 40- to 50-year-old dummies that are not anatomically representative of the average female, in terms of height, weight and body type — despite newer, more high-tech testing dummies being available.
title: Cars aren't tested properly for women's safety. Congress is trying to fix that.

description: A manager at a Pennsylvania Planet Fitness allegedly refused to allow good Samaritans to use the gym’s defibrillator on a man who had a heart attack outside.
title: Lawsuit accuses Planet Fitness of refusing to assist man who had heart attack near gym

description: Gotham FC captain Tierna Davidson tore her ACL and will not play for the U.S. women's national soccer team in the Saturday's game against Brazil.
title: Soccer star Tierna Davidson out for season with torn ACL, replaced on USWNT for Brazil rematch

description: Sen. Cory Booker shattered a nearly 70-year record Tuesday with the longest Senate speech in history, and went viral doing it.
title: Cory Booker goes viral in shattering a nearly 70-year record with historic marathon Senate speech

description: A University of Minnesota graduate business student who’s being held by ICE is suing for his immediate release, saying his arrest violated his rights and he’s been given little explanation for why he’s being held.
title: Minnesota student detained by ICE who lost visa for DUI thought he was being kidnapped

description: Watch live coverage as President Trump is expected to announce his plans for reciprocal tariffs at a White House event.
title: Trump expected to announce plans for reciprocal tariffs

description: Myanmar’s ruling military declared a civil-war ceasefire to ease relief efforts following a 7.7 magnitude earthquake that has killed more than 3,000 people.
title: Myanmar earthquake death-toll tops 3,000 as junta declares a ceasefire to ease aid

description: Val Kilmer, the actor known for his roles in "Top Gun" and "Heat," died from pneumonia Tuesday night in Los Angeles after struggling with throat cancer for years that permanently altered his voice.
title: Inside Val Kilmer's 11-year struggle with throat cancer

description: A transgender teacher in Texas resigned from her job Monday, less than a week after a state lawmaker called for her to be fired over a social media video where she talks about feeling supported by her students.out feeling supported by her students.
title: A trans teacher in Texas resigns after being targeted by conservatives online

description: The Supreme Court handed a win to the Food and Drug Administration over its refusal to approve flavored e-cigarettes.
title: Supreme Court rules for the FDA in flavored vapes dispute

description: Gaia Music Collective turned a viral moment into a national singing phenomenon.
title: How strangers are connecting through pop-up choirs

description: A judge ruled to dismiss corruption charges against New York City Mayor Eric Adams after the Trump administration argued the case distracted from his ability to enforce immigration policy.
title: NYC Mayor Eric Adams' corruption case is dismissed

description: New York Governor Kathy Hochul, civil rights groups and local school leaders have expressed shock over the detention of three children and their mother in New York state.
title: New York governor attacks ICE over 'cruel' detention of three children and their mother

description: Musk’s tenure as a special government employee overseeing DOGE is set to end after 130 days.
title: Trump told Cabinet members Elon Musk will leave his government role in the coming months

description: The jury is still out on the real long-term effects of the 'torpedo,' a relatively new bat style that is shaking up MLB.
title: MLB's torpedo bats aren't new — and they aren't magic

description: Democrats scored a critical win on Tuesday with Susan Crawford's victory in Wisconsin's Supreme Court race despite a massive campaign effort for the Republican candidate from Elon Musk. It comes as Republicans grew their House majority, winning both special elections in Florida. NBC’s Ryan Nobles reports for TODAY.
title: Democrats score critical win in Wisconsin’s Supreme Court race

description: President Donald Trump is set to unveil his long-promised reciprocal tariffs on foreign adversaries and allies that are set to go into effect immediately once they are announced on Wednesday. It comes as he ramps up cuts to the federal workforce with about 10,000 jobs eliminated across the Department of Health and Human. NBC’s Peter Alexander reports for TODAY.
title: Trump's new tariffs set to go into effect amid widespread job cuts

description: Donald Trump is expected to announce new tariffs.
title: Trump to announce new tariffs and Susan Crawford wins in Wisconsin race: Morning Rundown

description: Michigan state Sen. Mallory McMorrow is jumping into the race to replace retiring Democratic Sen.
title: Mallory McMorrow jumps into Michigan’s Senate race with a call for change in the Democratic Party

description: The Supreme Court will hear a dispute arising from an effort by anti-abortion Republican officials in South Carolina to prevent reproductive health care provider Planned Parenthood from receiving Medicaid funds.
title: Supreme Court hears South Carolina dispute over attempt to defund Planned Parenthood

description: President Donald Trump was expected to roll out the largest set of new trade barriers in generations Wednesday.
title: Trump's 'Liberation Day' unfolds with new reciprocal tariffs sparking fear, uncertainty

description: The women’s accounts raise new questions about the thoroughness of the administration’s vetting of migrants it has sent to the notorious prison.
title: 'We were lied to:' Two women the Trump administration tried to send to El Salvador prison speak

description: Val Kilmer, the movie star known for roles in blockbusters like “Top Gun" and “Batman Forever,”  died Tuesday night at the age of 65, his daughter told the Associated Press.
title: Val Kilmer, of 'Top Gun' and 'Batman Forever' fame, dies at 65

description: Republicans also got key reinforcements for their slim House majority at an important moment. And Democrats made gains compared to 2024 in each key race.
title: Democrats have a new boogeyman in Elon Musk: Takeaways from Tuesday's elections

description: As Democrats celebrate a battleground-state win in the most expensive judicial campaign in U.S. history, President Donald Trump and the GOP are confronting a worrying early sign about what the intense spotlight on Elon Musk’s influence means for the party.
title: Trump White House brushes off Wisconsin loss amid warning signs around Elon Musk's role

description: Susan Crawford, a Dane County circuit judge who was backed by Democrats in a heated race, thanked her supporters after her projected with in the Wisconsin Supreme Court race.
title: Susan Crawford projected winner in Wisconsin Supreme Court race
